A conversation about politics led to a flight diversion to Harrisburg International Airport Friday morning. Security cameras provide one purpose: to make sure it's safe inside a building or in this case your home. RIO DE JANEIRO (AP) - The Latest on the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.

item.title: So the media experts are there for their own gain...who should be surprised ?
item.description:
So the media experts are there for their own gain...who should be surprised ?

The media giveth and the media taketh away. That is the lesson Donald Trump is currently learning - and he is learning it the hard way. His frustration with the "dishonest media" shouldn't be surprising. After all, his rise from self-promoting, self-proclaimed billionaire to Republican presidential nominee was abetted by the same press that is now in the process of pouring cold water on him.

item.title: OK Mr. Trump, you have rallied many in the nation at the start of your campaign. Myself included. It is now time for you to realize that this is not about you, but about the movement you created to turn America around. Letâ€™s start hearing something of substance as opposed to bashing Hillary or the Media.
item.description:
OK Mr. Trump, you have rallied many in the nation at the start of your campaign. Myself included. It is now time for you to realize that this is not about you, but about the movement you created to turn America around. Letâ€™s start hearing something of substance as opposed to bashing Hillary or the Media.

No candidate in Donald Trump's position at this stage of the campaign has gone on to win the popular vote in November in the modern polling era. That's the sobering news confronting the Trump campaign as it seeks to rebound from his recent slump.

item.title: If I am not mistaken I believe Scranton just might be in coal country. I do believe in green energy but we need a broad mix. It will be interesting to see if any mention of closing mines will be in her speach.
item.description:
If I am not mistaken I believe Scranton just might be in coal country. I do believe in green energy but we need a broad mix. It will be interesting to see if any mention of closing mines will be in her speach.

Hillary Clinton and Joe Biden hold rally at Riverfront Sports in Scranton, Pennsylvania.

item.title: Every African American Should Vote for Donald Trump After Watching This
item.description:
Every African American Should Vote for Donald Trump After Watching This

August 16, 2016- Donald Trump makes a passionate plea to every African American voter: The Democratic party and Hillary Clinton have taken advantage of and betrayed you. I am asking for the vote of every African American in this country who wants a different and much better future.

item.title: Click here to support I Know A Teacher by Rick Ondrusek
item.description:
Click here to support I Know A Teacher by Rick Ondrusek

I know a teacher. She is my niece. My wife said the other day that she was going to the piggy bank to help pay for supplies. This is not the first time she has self funded items that I feel should be in a teachers annual budget.
